manifest_version.description: One integer specifying the version of the manifest file format your package requires.

version.description: One to four dot-separated integers identifying the version of this extension.

description.description: A plain text description of the extension

icons.description: One or more icons that represent the extension, app, or theme. Recommended format: PNG; also BMP, GIF, ICO, JPEG.

16.description: Used as the favicon for an extension's pages and infobar.

48.description: Used on the extension management page.

128.description: Used during installation and in the Store.

256.description: Used during installation and in the Store.

homepage_url.description: The URL of the homepage for this extension.

minimum_heart_version.description: The version of anytype-heart that your extension, app, or theme requires, if any.
